attributes.action: I would like to see parliament dissolved if Brexit isn't carried out.
attributes.additional_details: I am just an ordinary average day person in this country who has always accepted the results of a democratic vote. I think if Brexit is not followed through democracy in this country is dead
attributes.background: I voted to leave the European union in a country wide free vote and l believe that their are parties in parliament that are trying to overturn the result of this democratic vote.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You start a new petition setting out clearly what action you would like to see happen.
